name: Tommy Torini
descriptions: Tommy Torini is a Chairmen talent agent and the manager for the Aces theater at the Tops, living in New Vegas in 2281.

The self-declared "talent manager, show scheduler, and all-around man in charge" of the Aces Theater, as well as one of the founders of the theater, However, since Benny had the Singer killed by Swank prior to the events of Fallout: New Vegas (a event seen in the graphic novel All Roads), he is looking for additional acts.
Tommy will hang around the Aces theater, but will also get up on stage and dance with the Rad Pack. He cannot be interacted with while dancing.
Note: His eyepatch cannot be looted, as it is marked as unusable.
Tommy Torini appears in Fallout: New Vegas. He is also mentioned in the graphic novel All Roads.

Tommy Torini bears significant resemblance to American entertainer Sammy Davis Jr., including the missing eye. Sammy lost his left eye in a car collision, but elected to be fitted with a glass eye (after wearing an eyepatch for six months). Likewise, Tommy's 'Rad Pack Revue' is an obvious nod to Frank Sinatra's 'Rat Pack'; of which, Sammy Davis Jr. was the only black member.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Swank filled me in about Benny. Hell of a thing, baby. Hell of a thing.

topics.topic_text: What do you think about Benny?
topics.response_text: Benny? Ahh, he's an all right cat, you dig? He don't got much musical talent, but he knows how to run a business. When he's around, anyways.

topics.topic_text: I want to talk to you about how much you're paying Billy Knight.
topics.response_text: That comedian you mean? Yeah, he practically begged me to hire him. Didn't even haggle.

topics.topic_text: What do you do here?
topics.response_text: Well, apart from serving as talent manager, show scheduler, and all-around man in charge of this fine theater, I happen to be its headline act.

topics.topic_text: What other entertainment is there on the Strip?
topics.response_text: Now why would you want to go breaking Tommy's heart asking a question like that?

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about the acts I recruited.
topics.response_text: The cowboy act? Yeah, he dropped on in here not too long before you. He's got chops, baby, real chops, and I ain't just talking about that mustache.

topics.topic_text: Tell me about this theater.
topics.response_text: Well, it was my idea - well, me and the rest of the Rad Pack boys. We took it to Benny, and he thought it was a good idea.

topics.topic_text: Swank mentioned you might be looking for some new acts. Can I help?
topics.response_text: Sure, baby, sure. Tommy's always looking for new talent to bring to the Aces.

topics.topic_text: Have you seen Benny?
topics.response_text: Dig it, baby, he beat feet to his suite. You scare the big boss man or something?

topics.topic_text: Sure, I'll keep an eye out.
topics.response_text: Ring-a-ding! My card.

topics.topic_text: Talent scouting isn't really my thing. I think I'll pass.
topics.response_text: All right, well, if you change your mind, just let me know.

topics.topic_text: Hang on, this comes out to 1,500 caps for Billy! He's worth three times that!
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] All right, you drive a hard bargain, baby. Tell you what, I'll bump him up to 3,000. That's fair. Here's your cut.

topics.topic_text: Yeah, I hear you. Any idea where he goes when he disappears like that?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Well, now, you didn't hear this from Tommy, but Benny likes to go off on a bender now and then.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: Sure thing, baby. What can Tommy do for you?

topics.topic_text: Okay, sorry, I didn't mean anything by it.
topics.response_text: It's cool, baby. Tommy's a forgiving fella.

topics.topic_text: Really? What kind of entertainment do you have?
topics.response_text: Well, acts are a little bit thin on the ground right now, but every night from eight to midnight, we got the Rad Pack Revue!

topics.topic: VMSTopsTalentPoolVMSTopsTommyToriniTopic007Maybe I could help you find some more acts for your show.
topics.topic_text: I've reconsidered about the talent scouting.
topics.response_text: Glad to hear it, baby! My card - pass it on if you see any good acts out there.

topics.topic_text: Sounds great.
topics.response_text: You know it, baby!

topics.topic_text: Make it 5% and you've got a deal.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Ooh, a sharp customer! All right, all right, 5% it is.

topics.topic_text: Thanks.
topics.response_text: Any day, baby, any day.

topics.topic_text: Hang on, this comes out to 1,500 caps for Billy! He's worth three times that!
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] All right, you drive a hard bargain, baby. Tell you what, I'll bump him up to 3,000. That's fair. Here's your cut.

topics.topic_text: Thanks.
topics.response_text: Any day, baby, any day.

topics.topic_text: Billy's worth three times what you're paying him.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] All right, you drive a hard bargain, baby. Tell you what, I'll bump him up to 3,000. That's fair. Here's the difference for your cut.
